title: Quiet get away
review: Loved staying here, it was so clean, personal and friendly. Staff very helpful and made sure stay was relaxing.  Would definitely recommend. Rooms cleaned every day and towels changed. Delightful breakfast full of cooked, cold, continental foods.

title: BQ Amfora Beach Hotel  Lovely
review: Rooms are not very large but enough space. Very clean and modern .  Great shower. Staff are friendly really enjoyed are stay so much. Going back in June for 10 days. Like the area. Plenty of path ways for long walks or cycle routes if you  wish.We went in October it was warm enough and the area was quiet which i really liked. If you want nightclubs on your door then not the place for you.

title: Fabulous *****
review: Excellent stay here with my husband. The location is perfect and just a short walk to the beach. The entire hotel is immaculate and cleaners are meticulous about attention to detail.  We had a beautiful suite with two huge TV’s (although we didn’t switch on so not sure what channels are available), a huge walk in shower, mini fridge and safe. Breakfast was amazing. Everything you could think of was available and omelettes (with plenty of choice for filling), pancakes etc. all made fresh to order. All varieties of breads, pastries and fresh fruits available. Hot choices such as bacon, sausage, tomatoes etc. A choice of cold meats and cheeses. My favourite was the fresh smoothies and there were even bottles of white and rose fizz on ice available. The quality, service and ambience were top class. Would visit again and would recommend.…

title: Very Good hotel
review: We had a very Good time in this hotel, also got a bottle of champagne for my birthday which was really nice.  Good cleaning service and also very tasty breakfasts, loads of things to choose from.  We would definitely stay again.

title: 5 day break
review: Excellent hotel. Spotless. Breakfast was super. Rooms a tad small but no problem also bathroom DEFINITELY could do with a shelf in it. Great position (for the beaches AND Palma itself) although aircraft noise could be an issue sometimes

title: Our first time in Mallorca and the hotel was excellent!
review: I have no real complaints about the hotel, yes the rooms are a bit small but we were hardly in the room so it didn't matter. The aircon did have a mind of its own sometimes, but luckily the weather wasn't too hot, I'm not sure the fridge worked, but again we only kept water in the room. The room was kept clean, and the TV channels were good. We ate in the hotel bar a few times and the food was excellent, in fact we had our best meal on the island in the hotel! The pool was very cold, but nice as it wasn't over crowded so had a good swim a few times. All the staff were very friendly and the breakfast buffet was fantastic, the freshly cooked eggs and pancakes were amazing and I probably ate way too much while I was there. If we were to go back to Mallorca we would definitely…

title: We have stayed for a week at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel in Can Pastilla Mallorca in October 2019.
review: Arrived early on a Sunday and had not expected to check in. However, it took a long time and I asked several times when the room would be ready. They promised to call when the room was ready. At 3pm I went to the reception when we heard nothing. Then the room was ready. The room was disappointing as it was extremely small to be a double room in a 4 star hotel. Missing hooks to hang clothes. Clothing storage was enough for just one person. The safe cost 21 Euro for one week.  The balcony was also small and needed to store their suitcases that barely fit in the room.  In the bathroom there was no storage for toiletries etc.  Enough of the negative and the positive was that there was very good cleaning in the rooms. Clean and nice in the hotel. The breakfast very good. Staff very…

title: Great hotel!
review: I booked this through ba.com and took a gamble based on the tripadvisor reviews. Proximity to the airport in a taxi (15 euros) was 10 minutes - super quick.The hotel was great. The single room although small had a large balcony and lovely bathroom with powerful shower. All mod cons in the room with nice touches like GB channels on the tv stations and good air-conditioning. The rooms were cleaned every day and kept spotless. The breakfast was fantastic - really well stocked with a huge variety to choose from including a hot plate with fried eggs and omelettes to order. the only niggle in the room was that the fridge didn't keep things that cold but was big enough for me in terms of holding bottles of water, juice etc. Also there were 12 hangers which, again for me, was fine.…

title: Delighted with our second visit
review: This hotel suits us well. Quiet & comfortable with welcoming and friendly staff. The food for breakfast at the Amfora and for dinner at the Apollo were excellent, with plenty of choice - though the labelling of food could be improved. .It is convenient for the harbour,  the town, the beach and coastal walk to Palma. The bus to Palma  and the airport is close, The only minor issue was that the fridge in the room did not work, I did use the swimming pool, it was very cold! We love this area and hope to return to the Amfora in the Spring.

title: Great Find
review: A lovely clean hotel with  friendly efficient staff . Very close to the airport....which cost 15 euros by taxi (minimum fare) or 5 euros per person by public transport . Only a short walk from the beach and a host of restaurants, bars etc . Large choice of food for breakfast which was excellent. Our room had a very pleasant small balcony, which I think all the rooms have . My only criticism would be that the room was quite small....fine for a short break but for a longer stay I would have wanted slightly more space . However we would definitely return as we really liked the hotel ,town and surrounding area .

title: Very close to beach and airport
review: Very nice staff og good and clean rooms. The hotel was not a big overcrowded hotel, and that's something we prefered. All in all a very good and pleasent stay at Mallorca. I'm  sure that we will return some day or another

title: Lovely New Hotel
review: We stayed here for 3 nights last month, we booked Bed & Breakfast. Good price, excellent value. Clean & modern hotel. Loved our Room, just as the Photographs, lovely en-suite with Walk In Shower With large white fluffy bath sheets & Toiletries. AC worked perfect. Choice @ Breakfast was ample, even Cava & Fresh Orange. Chef cooking eggs, omelettes, pancakes etc to order. Central for Restaurants, Bar & Beach. We will definitely stay here next time. Thank you, Andrea & Olaf X

title: Nice and clean hotel with good location
review: Good location, close to beach and airport. Easy connections to public transport. Clean room and good breakfast.  Pool area rather small but sufficient for a morning swim or a few hours relaxation.  Few minutes walk to the beach boulevard and the beach. Taxi to airport 5 minutes. Good variance of food nearby from street kitchens to seafood or steak restaurants.

title: Good Hotel
review: Position: Very good. 10 minutes to beach, 5 minutes to bus stop to Palma, shops and restaurants in the neighborhood.  Parking: there is no parking slot at hotel, parking in streets around is possible Room: very small rooms – it is hard to find place where to place and open the luggage, clean, balcony. (Equip: safe, hair drier, TV, Aircon, freeWiFi-good)  Beach: sandy beach 10 min. walk, very long, soft sand Breakfast: good, rich choice, coffee-average, juice-dispenser  Staff: friendly and warm (good English)  Baggage room: it is possible to keep the luggage there and have a shower even after check out. Rent a car recommendation: We were very satisfied with company “Wiber”, 10 mins from the airport by their shuttle bus to/from the airport, good prices and perfect service Overall:…

title: Frengler
review: Super hotel service right in top room very small  Best hotel so 1000 Stars for you Very central good restaurants in area Staff at The hotel 200 % top and know kids Great pool and restaurant  Breakfast Best in The area

title: Clean yet small
review: Room was really tiny, hardly room to set out our suitcase. However it was extremely clean on arrival and cleaned to the same standard daily. The entire hotel was really clean. Pool area needs music to create some atmosphere.  Breakfast was average; smoothies tasted like water, omelettes and sausages not cooked enough.  Bar snacks were nice. Short walk from the shops, restaurants and beach. Only took 5mins in taxi from the airport, charged €15.

title: 3 Stars max!
review: Hotel and room was clean, cleaning ladies did a great Job. Booked a double room for single use, I could not see how two people could stay in this room. The room was just big enough for one. The Safe can only be used for a fee of 3.50€ a day. Never have I stayed at the Hotel that I had to pay for using a safe, this is supposed to be a 4* Hotel. The Place is really catering to the massive tourist loaf of Mallorca. Breakfast is Buffet style, Lots of Fruits out of the Can, Vegetables in the omelette where cold and raw. Great selection of bread and Pastries.

title: Great for a short stay
review: Very clean, although a bit souless, this hotel is up a side street, which means it has no sea views, or any views at all really, but more importantly, it is absolutely impossible to park a car any where near it. Our room was absolutely tiny - literally the sideways shuffle to get down the side of the bed. Having said that, the staff were friendly, and as many have said, the breakfast was very good indeed.  We only stayed one night, having arrived at Palma Airport late in the evening, and it is very close indeed to the airport - great for the plane spotters. NOTE - Do not accept Booking.Com's kind offer of €25 for an advance taxi to this hotel - picking one up at the airport cost €14!!

title: relaxing holiday
review: Lovely modern clean hotel with everything you need.Good food,great drink prices and really attentive staff.A lovely pool and terraced area outside with parasols with some evening  entertainment .Would definitely recommend.

title: Great place to stay
review: Staff was super friendly and hotel was really nice.  It's about a block from a beach cove and a block and a half maybe from the open beach.  Lots of restaurants depending on ur budget to eat at.  They had great breakfast options. If your doing public transportation there are several bus stops at the end of the block, 1.50€ to ride.  Definitely recommend.

title: Lovely stay as usual
review: Third time stayed here and great as usual . Great proximity to beach & bars . Breakfast is excellent ,coffee could do with some improvement. Rooms are a tad on the small side but adequate for a long weekend . Will return no doubt .

title: Comfortable and relaxing
review: Stayed 5 nights.  Emailed to advise our approximate arrival time and we were given a room a few hours before normal check in- brilliant!  Room not a bad size - larger than some others in Can Pastilla.  Plenty of room for our packing cubes.  Bed really comfortable and bathroom n9t a bad size either once you get used to size of shower.  Lovely thick white towels.  Hairdryer was good for a hotel one.  Close to where we love in Can Pastilla for restaurants, beach and drinks at the Aquamarina Hotel after the beach and after dinner.  Breakfast was always good.  Great coffee and we sat at the side each morning and there were windows looking over green scrubs.  The breakfast area is well laid out, modern and bright.  We loved this hotel and will go back.

title: Absolutely brilliant
review: Could not fault this hotel. It is extremely clean , literally a 5 minute drive from the airport and a five minute walk from the beach. Pool was lovely and clean and managed to get a sun lounger every day without any problems. The snack bar does nice food and cocktails for a really reasonable price and the breakfast was delicious with loads of choice every morning. Rooms were quite small but cleaned every day, air conditioning was great and the balcony was lovely with sun most of the day. Would not hesitate to visit again or recommend to others !

title: The best hotel 💕
review: The best holiday what I had in this summer!!! The staff was sooo friendly, the room was amazing. We will come back next summer definitely! If you ho to Mallorca, this is the best choice! The breakfast was sooo nice! Thank you so much for everything

title: Quiet and close to everything
review: Quiet location but close to beaches and restaurants. Clean rooms and efficient staff. Good breakfast selection.   Lovely bike ride to Palma. Close to water activity hire.  Perfect for long weekends as close enough  to the airport for 10 minutes taxi transfer.

title: Beautiful hotel, amazing and friendly staff!
review: Clean and beautiful rooms, good food, amazing breakfast! Perfect place with pool for holiday. Pool is very clean! Staff is amazing! Positive vibes, 10/10, very friendly and  helpfull.  We are coming again for sure :)

title: A great hotel, would definitely return if in the area
review: Currently staying at BQ Amfora Beach and it has been brilliant.  Can Pastilla is quite a quiet resort but that's what we wanted. A nice, relaxing holiday. The hotel is situated on a quiet street a few minutes walk from Cala Estancia beach and a little further to long stretch of Platja Palma. There are lots of bars and restaurants around the area. If you want to visit Palma city the 15 and 30 buses serve close by and are frequent and cheap (1.50euro each way).  The hotel itself is clean and modern. Our room is on the 4th floor and we cannot hear any external noise. Other reviews mention small sized rooms. I cannot speak for other rooms but ours is perfectly adequate even with twin beds instead of a double (that was our only gripe but we accept many hotels do not always provide…

title: Overnight stay
review: We stayed here after a delayed flight into Palma. The night manager was really helpful and the guy couldn’t do enough for us after such a long day. Room was perfect and spotlessly clean. Good breakfast and there is a selection for every taste. The front desk staff were super helpful when we needed help with a problem. Only downside is car parking. I had to park 4 blocks away.

title: Perfect In Every Way
review: We stayed here for 4 nights and couldn’t fault it at all. 5 mins to a little coved beach or a bigger one just past the Marina on the front. The hotel had parasols and beach mats outside the entrance for guests to use, which we did daily, this was a nice touch. Breakfast was plentiful and something for everyone. We arrived late so the buses had stopped otherwise we’d of used this from the airport but literally 8 mins in a cab for 15 euros. All the staff are friendly and very helpful. The rooms are very clean as is the whole hotel. We are outside in the seated area next to the pool one night and this was excellent and reasonably priced. We will definitely stay here again.

title: Good Stay for Your Buck
review: Hotel was 6 minutes away from the beach, which was a lovely walk. Located in minutes from a SPAR which was handy for bottles of water. Room was clean, a little small but decent for what you paid. Breakfast was a lovely, help yourself to a variety of food and drinks! Pool was okay, played some good music. Overall pleased with the stay :)

title: Very clean hotel
review: I had booked for 4 nights at this hotel with bed and breakfast board. The hotel was very clean , very helpful staff and polite  The room was clean everyday and the beds very comfort. All the rooms had a balcony and mine had a view to the pool. The breakfast was amazing....a lot of choices. The beach is only 5 min walk. There is a bus stop close to the hotel as you are coming from Palma airport and also to go back to the airport. The ticket for the bus to go to the airport costs 5 euro and same price from the airport . It takes only 10 min drive from the airport to Can Pastilla. We definitely recommend this hotel...and it is very quiet.

title: Super nice hotel close to the beach
review: I went there simply for one night before catching my flight as it was conveniently at 5 mins from the airport, so I didn’t have very high expectations but it was a great surprise !  The staff is very friendly, the rooms are modern and clean, we even had a violin concert by the pool in the evening, really nice. Special mention to the breakfast, extremely complete, with pretty much anything you can imagine. I decided to take a walk to the beach in the evening and it’s literally at 5 minutes so you are almost on it without the evening noise to sleep. Highly recommended !

title: Perfect holiday from start to finish
review: Just got back from this immaculate hotel. Literally couldn't fault it. Modern throughout, decent WiFi and fridge in room. Short stroll to the gorgeous coved beach with crystal clear water. This is a quiet resort but still has a great stretch of bars and restaurants. Definitely not a roudy holiday,so if you're after some life this probably isn't the resort for you. There's a burger king and KFC close by. Hiring bikes is a must. We hired from Rollerking,a lovely German gentleman with very reasonable prices. €6 for two bikes for two hours. Plenty of time to get to Palma to see the beautiful cathedral. Use the little bike track all the way. the hotel booked us a taxi to the airport and it came within minutes for €12. Fantastic place with great people. No noise whatsoever in the…

title: Worth every penny
review: This hotel was just perfect for us, playa de Palma just about 3min walk. Bus stop 1 block away, service and breakfast were amazing. In case you’re only for the weekend the bus is only 1 stop from the airport.

title: Nice place if you have an early departure from Palma Airport
review: Nice place if you have an early departure from Palma Airport. The hotel is new and modern. The breakfast has everything. The pool is a little small. It is adults only - so no children. Parking is hard to find.

title: We felt the difference between 3 star hotels in this area
review: Last time we visited Mallorca we were staying in Arenal in a 3 star hotel. At that time we thought it's quite OK. Out thoughts changed as we walked into Amfora Beach end of this May. The room is quite small, but suited us 2 people completely. Walls aren't very thin, sound isolation is good. We almost didn't hear airplanes when the balcony door was closed. Plenty of space to hang clothes and store little things in drawers. Cleanliness is outstanding. The hotel and rooms didn't have any strong smell of chlorine that we had experienced in other hotels in Mallorca. Everything I chose to eat for breakfast was very tasty, starting from live cooked pancakes to fruit smoothies. The swimming pool was quite chilly for me, we were told that it's 18 degrees C, but the look of itself pulled…

title: Wannebe 4 star
review: How this can be a 4 star hotel is a mystery.  Rooms are extremly small, and very limited with places to store your cloths. In the bathroom it's nowhere to put your personal items or hang up even the hotel towels. Toilet sqeezed in the corner and not possible to sit straight.  Aircon stopped working. Wifi is poor.  The staff dont really care for spesial needs like allergy, poor or no knowledge at all.  Cheap poor quality breakfast in basement with no view. (Why not use outdoor area?) Poor cofee machines making thin awfull cofee and they dont know how to make prooer cofee at the espressomachine either. The best things to say abot this place is that its clean and the bed suited my preferance. Location is ok, close to the beach.   Pooltowels 20 euro...deposit.. have som faith to…

title: This was not our first visit to a BQ Hotel and it will not be our last.
review: My first impression was positive. Staff on reception were polite and friendly despite it being around midnight when we arrived.   The room itself was small and basic but it did the job. It was pleasingly clean. The air conditioner is not set to cool in April so I asked for a fan and was pleased to find that they had one which they provided.  This is a nice touch.   Personally, I disliked that the toilet had no lock on it. This could be off putting to some people. The wall for the bathroom is an obscured glass but you can see the faint outline of those inside it if they are near to it.    We had breakfast there. They have a good selection of breads, cereals, fruits and meats. They do however, fresh fried eggs upon request. They had bacon and sausage but not every day and…

title: Holiday in Mallorca
review: Really nice hotel in quiet street with balcony. Very good location, few minutes (about 15) from/to airport. Breakfast was every day very good with smoothie, fruit, eggs, salami, ham,...  Can Pastilla is great for walking, running, cycling and it is not too far for trip by car (Palma, Formentor, Sollér, Valdemossa,...) We can recomand bike rent @berganibikes and car rent @hipercar. It was great holiday!

title: Great hotel
review: The atmosphere at the hotel was quiet and relaxing, though sadly we overlooked an apartment that could be noisy at night. The breakfast and dinner were excellent, with lots of choice. My only criticism was of poor labelling of food - eg there were 4 bowls of yogurt available at breakfast, but no label to say what type they were.This could be a problem with people who had dietary issues, or lead to wastage.  Rooms were modern and adequate. The location was good, near the harbour, a beach and a conservation area walk towards Palma. Bus stops were nearby. We were unaware on booking that dinner was not served at our hotel, but at a sister hotel about 7 mins walk away. We were ok with this, though not when it rained! The food was worth the walk though!

title: Great place
review: Great location - close to the beach with heaps of restaurants!  Breakfast was delicious with a great selection of yoghurts, fresh fruits, pastries, warm foods (eggs, bacon, sausages, pancakes ect), breads, coffees and so on. Only complain about the breakfast was the staff making omelettes and pancakes. One person was in charge of this station and she was SO slow. Only taking one order at a time, it would easily take 20 min to get an omelette - there was two heating plates and enough room for two people to take charge of this.  Rooms were clean and with enough room for two people - bed was very comfortable with great pillows.  Pool-area was great as well and staff was paying good attention to people ordering drinks and food.  Staff in the reception need to get a lesson on…

title: Nice adults only hotel close to the beach
review: Good location, only 300m from the nearest beach. Friendly staff. Rooms are small, but very clean and modern. Air conditioner in every room ( and it even worked :) Breakfast was good. Restaurants and grocery stores nearby and bus stop only 150m away. Storage for rental bikes. Street is one way, so very quiet neighbourhood. Only the departing airplanes may disturb.

title: A very nice hotel.
review: This hotel is well placed for the coastal path which is yards away in one direction and the local bus which is also close in the other direction. It is also close to two small supermarkets, shops and restaurants. We walked to Palma (5 miles) the first day and took the bus back. The bus is cheap at 1.5euro or 1euro per journey with the 10 ticket card which can be bought locally.  The hotel is clean and the staff are friendly. The lady who was cleaning the room is very efficient.  The breakfast is excellent. The freshly made tortilla is very good and there is a large variety of hot and cold food. The breakfast staff were friendly and attentive.  The large double bed in the room was very comfortable. However, the rooms are small. There is a narrow gap between the bottom of the bed…

title: Perfect hotel
review: We've just returned from a 4 night stay and couldn't fault it. It is spotlessly clean and the staff are very friendly and efficient. The rooms are quite small but perfectly adequate with very comfortable beds, the bathroom was spacious. Breakfast was delicious, an excellent choice of hot and cold food, smoothies and even cava! A special mention to Pepi behind the bar and also the gentleman who also served drinks and was in the restaurant at breakfast time, both very friendly, the drinks were very reasonably priced too. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Lovely staff, rooms miles to small
review: Couldn’t fault the staff, had the best daiquiri ever here! Breakfast was good, although slow to replenish supplies. The staff and cleanness of this hotel cannot be faulted, however I would not stay here again due to the fact the rooms are to small with absolutely no storage apart from an open wardrobe with approx 12 hangers and pot holes for other bits and bobs. Pool area for sun beds in low season would be fine, forget going high season, you would be packed in like sardines.

title: Lovely hotel with fabulous breakfast and friendly staff
review: We stayed for 4 nights before Easter and enjoyed being here. As other's have experienced, the taxi driver drove to the wrong BQ hotel as there are two close together in Can Pastilla. Check in was smooth, rooms are small but ok for a couple, very modern and clean, buffet breakfast was fantastic with a wide range or food and drink. Beach is a few minutes away and the promenade on Playa Palma (from S'Arenal to Palma) is a lovely walk or cycle in either direction, as this hotel was perfectly placed in the middle of the two. Recommended!

title: Loser!
review: We arrived at this hotel after midnight due to a delayed flight. When we arrived there were 8 people on line to check in, and only one employee. I felt sorry for this elderly employee because he was so overworked. Evidently  they did not think about putting on an additional employee due to the holiday (Easter) week. It took us an hour to check in. When we got to the front, finally, my requested room was given away. I got a room on the first floor, rather than on a high floor. The gentlemen working the desk said he coudn't change my room because the computer was not working. Wow! The room is ridiculously tiny. There is room only to pass between the bed and the bureau if you stand sideways! There is absolutely no storage space, so if you make the mistake of going here, pack…

title: Very good but tiny room
review: Dear customer,  Thank you very much for your opinion. At BQ Hoteles we like to read each of them, as they make us feel closer to our guests and more able to meet their expectations in a future. We are very sad to hear that this time you did not have a good experience staying at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel.  Going into your comments, as you confirmed you arrived at midnight, but unfortunately not all clients tell us their arrival time, and obviously we only have 1 person per shift, specially during the night time. We are sad to hear that you didn´t get the requested room, anyway we never confirmed it, we always depend on the availability and do our best to satisfy all clients.  I also want to inform you that all our rooms have an  standard size, around 15m2, I´m sorry that you felt it was a bit tiny.  We are happy to read that you loved our breakfast, this is one of our key points at BQ Hoteles, excellent food and service is a must.  Despite your negative comments, we really hope that you give us a second chance and will be happy to welcome again at one of our BQ hoteles.  Thanks again for your comments !  Your sincerly!  BQ Hoteles

title: Nice hotel.
review: Pros: Great location for restaurants, bars, beach Quiet location Spotlessly clean  Modern Comfy beds Pleasant professional staff Excellent breakfasts  Plenty of sun beds   Cons: Very tiny hot room Air con not switched on yet Wi-fi terrible

title: 4 star hotel with 5 star qualities
review: The staff was very kind. We checked out in the early morning, because my flight is very early. The staff arranged for us to have breakfast at 4:30, so I could use breakfast so early! Although simple breakfast, it is enough. There is a bar on the first floor and the decor is good. I checked out at five o'clock, and asked the staff to call the taxi to the airport, and the taxi came in three minutes. Take a taxi from the hotel to the airport at 15 Euro. The only downside: this hotel can't connect to Wi-Fi quickly. It's too bad. It's so difficult to connect to Wi-Fi. It can't be accessed for a long time. I finally can use WiFi, but it’s a turtle speed Wi-Fi😢, I can’t upload photos at all, I hope the hotel improve. The hotel and the room are clean and comfortable, the air…

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Very clean modern room five minutes walk to the beach. Very helpful staff and the food and drinks at the bar were great value. Highly recommended. 30 minutes bus ride into Palma where you can get trains or buses all over the island. Bus stops only a few minutes walk. Small supermarket near to hotel and loads of bars and restaurants along the beach. Great location.

title: Great hotel, well located with easy access to both the beach and town
review: Stayed for a long weekend in October 2018, is well situated as it is an adults only hotel which is both a Close ( 5 minutes) walk to the beach with an assortment of local bars/ restaurants or a 20 minute bus ride into Palma town. The staff where great and nothing was was an issue to resolve. We have already booked to go back next year, we look forward to seeing you all again then.

title: Brilliant
review: Perfect location 100m from the beach ... lovely staff and beautiful breakfast. Totally relaxing adult only hotel. Rooms comfortable and clean , no complaints.  Pool area clean. Drinks really good value. Definitely recommend.

title: Perfect Location, lovely hotel & staff
review: We stayed at this hotel for a long weekend in October and it was a great location just a few minutes from the beach and restaurants etc.  The staff were all so friendly, kind and helpful.  Room and hotel areas were spotless.  The rooms are small but perfectly formed.  Good size balcony and powerful shower.  Couple of negatives - no mirror over the dressing table so only option is to use the dryer and apply make-up in the bathroom which gets very warm as there is no air con in there.  The safe is under the hanging space which isn't very big anyway, so long dresses curl up over it.  However, there was enough space for long weekend but anything over a week I would struggle with storage, but then I don't travel light! Prices in the hotel for food and drinks were actually cheaper…

title: Lovely hotel and food faultless
review: Stayed for 7 days in September 2018 in a room with double bed on the 2nd floor. Room itself was too small for 2 adults due to the layout. We have stayed at this hotel prior to its refurbishment and the refurbishment is fantastic. Modern, airy and staff excellent.  We stayed bed and breakfast and could not fault the food. Plenty of choices for all.  Rooms were spotless and the air conditioning was welcomed.  Not far to walk tot the beach and the bus stops were regular for Palma. We are looking to stay there again for sure but will see if we can book the larger rooms that they have next time.

title: Great!
review: Nice, clean and modern hotel with best location! Everything in walking distance, also a buss stop so you can visit palma easily. Breakfast is superb! Only bad thing is pool location- sun hits the pool only in afternoon, but that didnt bother us that much. Lovely and helpfull staf 😊

title: Interesting but lacks proper air conditioning
review: My wife and I stayed at this hotel and the first room we were given had deficient air conditioning, the temperature remaining around 25 or 26oC. We complained and were given another room on the first floor, where the air conditioning was better but not perfect. The room is quite small. Otherwise, it is close to the beach and several restaurants. But I believe you can find something better for the same price.

title: very happy
review: Dear customer,  Firstly we thank you for reaching out to us on Tripadvisor to share your concerns related to your recent holiday with us at BQ Amfora Beach and apologize that you felt your experience did not completely meet your expectations. Your feedback is really important to us and we will be making sure your remarks are bought to the attention of the appropriate management so they can share your comments about the areas you highlight in your review.  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Lovely relaxing stay
review: Modern hotel and great location.  Very short walk to the sea and at the nice end where the harbour is.  We didn't sit round the pool and this area is quite small, but did sit outside to get a drink which was nice.  Rooms quite small but they were comfortable, modern and the blackout curtain was fantastic.  Small fridge in room and safe, but couldn't use it so think we needed to pay for that.  We had a balcony and could see the sea - the rooms nearer the swimming pool wouldn't be able to see the sea.  There is the main block and a block over the road.  Were in the main block.  I guess it doesn't make much difference but not sure.  Would visit again.

title: Miss
review: My wife and I were looking for somewhere to take a short three night break.  So we ended up here.  A lovely chilled out atmosphere close to the beach and the main area of Playa de Palma if you wanted to go out and eat.  The hotel menu was limited but good value for money and well prepared.  Both food and drink were more than reasonable so if you were spending a lazy day or days by the pool then you were well catered for.  Breakfast is a buffet affair with pancakes, fried eggs and palettes available on request.  The buffet catered to the British and Germany palates as they appear to be the main nationality of the guests.  Now Brits don’t worry.  You won’t come to the pool and find sun beds covered in towels :-)  The sun breaks over the pool around midday and that’s when it gets…

title: Fabulous 2nd Stay
review: This was our second visit to BQ Amfora beach after staying 2 years ago. We returned as our first visit had been perfect, 5 night stay, and this time we stayed for 6 nights. No regrets, absolutely fab hotel. Rooms are small, but beds very comfy, and enough hanging space for clothes for a week. Fridge and safe included in the room, although fridge could be colder. Bathroom and shower all amazing, although no room for wash bags in the bathroom, and not a lot of shelf space in the room. One thing I would like to see is a mirror in the bedroom above the dressing table for us ladies to do our hair and make up! The bathroom had 3 mirrors ! Please put one in the bedroom Amfora Beach. When hubby was in shower and using bathroom I was unable to get ready to go put for dinner and then…

title: Fabulous Property & Great Staff
review: Having picked this property for a quick two night stay I can honestly say the whole experience was Four Star Plus..  On arrival we were greeted by the receptionist called Michelle who made us feel welcome & although early we were allowed to check in to room 207 just after midday.  The room at the back of the property was quiet and although compact was well maintained & had everything you could desire as in AC , UK TV Channels plus a comfortable bed.  Breakfast was an array of foods being hot & cold with a great selection of dishes for all parties plus all the staff we encountered during our stay were happy & content.  In fact we liked it here so much we have booked to return again in October for three nights and its just nice even in September too feel welcomed like a guest and…

title: Lovely Stay - As Always
review: Lovely comfortable, clean hotel .  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Superb breakfast. As other review say the rooms are not large but have everything in that you need, superb bed and kept immaculately clean - due to the great location and fantastic beaches you will definitely not spend a lot of time in your room!  We've stayed here for the past three years and will be back next summer.  Thank you for a lovely holiday.

title: Great Stay
review: Lovely comfortable and clean room, not the biggest room however but we weren't there to stay in our room! Lovely staff, friendly and attentive - really nice stay. Breakfast was extensive but typical continental, as the clientele was mainly German but even the guests were friendly, so helped have a really pleasant stay, would definitely return.

title: Great weekend stay
review: Loved the hotel, very clean and modern, yes! the rooms are on the small side, but we only wanted a base and what a great one this is. Beds are super comfy too. Hotel is literally 5 mins away and if you turn left at the seafront you have the whole of Playa de Palma beach in front of you, stretching all the way to El Arenal. Staff are friendly and helpful and Christina ? I think was very helpful in helping us change room as we did not want to be on ground floor. We were there to celebrate my birthday so the bottle of bubbly left in the room was a lovely touch and really appreciated. Also loved watch ing planes take off in the distance, and the noise is very minimal. Great stay and would recommend.

title: Good hotel but doesn't feel 4 stars.
review: PROS: - Location: close to the airport and the public beach.  - Breakfast: very nice breakfast full of sweets and savoury food, coffe (even espresso is included) and a chef that cooks for you what you prefer - omelettes, pancakes etc. -Staff: friendly and welcoming, everyone we met was able to speak several languages and was eager to help.  CONS:  - Room size: way too small !!! I was not expecting such a small room. It is hard to move inside and is very narrow - Room Cleaning: room cleaning has not been consistent. Some days we had toiletries refilled some days not. Also never through out my stay I had the flooring cleaned and by the end of the holiday it was uncomfortable to walk barefoot as it was filthy   Overall I would go back as the general experience was ok but I wouldn't…

title: Very good, small and not that expensive
review: We got a room for 3 and that had just enough room for 2. Beds were ok.  Service was generally good. AC works.  Liked the breakfast very much and the restaurant has an upstanding price value. You get quality food cheaper than in any other restaurant in the area. So I recommend to use the restaurant.  Pool area is a bit too small and there aren't enough sun beds. One isn't allowed to reserve one but the hotel guests dd so and staff allowed that. We didn't get sun beds. So we had to go to the beach and sand was literally everywhere..

title: Couldn’t be happier
review: Currently on a ten night holiday at this hotel with my partner. I couldn’t be happier with the place. Everything is spotless from the rooms to the communal areas. The staff couldn’t be nicer and are always very welcoming especially the cleaners who always share a smile and always seem to be very happy despite the fact they are working.  Breakfast is your average holiday breakfast with hot and cold food and fresh fruit and cakes and pancakes.  The menu at the bar for during the day sells the nicest of pizza at such reasonable price! Soft drinks are €1.80 which is a lot better than other places I have visited. There is a little supermarket two minutes from the hotel too if you wish to buy cans etc.  The pool itself gets sunshine around the back of twelve and it is there till late.…

title: Do not go here...
review: 174 euro for a prison cell, looking out at a wall... tv not working... blanket do not have cover..... Ants in the bed.... I am very grateful that it is only for one night..!!!  If you are handicapped do not go here... we are put in the room af the handicapped, more like a prison cell then a hotel room...

title: Nice break
review: Dear Betina,  First of all I want to thank you for your personal opinion, we apologize that you didn´t feel comfortable in your room, it´s very strange as we constantly have these rooms occupied and never received such an opinion, anyway we will take a look and of course consider your words. Unfortunately you don´t mention if you reported this issue to our staff, which always have a perfect solution to everything, in this case we could have given you another handicaped room.  Once more we regret that you had to experience this situation and hope to be able to welcome you again at BQ Hoteles and give you the stay you deserve.  Have a nice day!!  BQ Hoteles

title: Beautiful hotel!
review: I visited the beautiful BQ Amfora Beach in July with my partner for our anniversary. We arrived very late at night, and the hotel staff made check in very easy. We arrived at our room on the 4th floor to find a bottle of fizz in our room with a personal message, which was a lovely touch. A slight issue with our air con was quickly rectified and we were given recommendations on where to go for food given the late hour.  The hotel is situated on a quiet residential street around a 5 minute walk from the beachfront. There is a small shop at one end which sells liquor and snacks, and plenty of restaurants and bars on all sides. A taxi from the airport took around 10 minutes due to the traffic system and cost €15. There is also a bus stop nearby if you arrive during the day.  The…

title: Loved every minute
review: Went for a 4 night break for my birthday end April/begin May and it couldn’t have been nicer. Hotel so modern and bright, lovely room, very modern shower room, everything spotlessly clean. Great breakfast buffet and lovely modern spacious dining room. Staff extremely friendly and helpful and work very hard. Can Pastilla itself is a lovely resort, clean and not rowdy. Excellent promenade, can walk for miles, one way to Palma, the other to Arenal. Very handy for the airport, less than 10 minutes, planes don’t bother that much. Easy to catch the bus into Palma for the day, not far at all. Oh and bottle of Cava waiting for us when we got there and on my actual birthday we got another, thanks very much!! If there’s one thing to say, it would be that we would have liked a little…

title: Great location, clean, good breakfast. Great experience
review: The room and bathroom were very clean. The room were equipped with safebox (paid separately), fridge (empty and not very cold but fine), hairdryer, toothbrush, toothpaste. Our room were a bit small. The breakfast was great, though foods were not labled. Great location (300 meters from a nice beach with plenty of good restaurants). Just two stops from the airport (less than 10 minutes). Friendly and helpful staffs who know english well enough.

title: Perfect
review: Perfect girls weekend away. Rooms clean, comfortable and stylish. Food was amazing and the food/drink prices are very reasonable. Sun reaches pool/lounges around midday but only a short walk to the beach.  Service from all staff was fantastic. Definitely will visit again. Thank you BQ Amfora!

title: Lovely Hotel - Hope to Return!
review: We were lucky enough to enjoy a four-night break in Can Pastilla in the second week of July. We stayed on a bed and breakfast basis - and given the quality of the breakfast, I would recommend this.  We arrived at the BQ Amfora after an evening flight. The check-in was painless and the receptionist provided a map and other information about the resort. All of the communal areas were very clean, the staff were always pleasant and it was clear that there were other guests who had stayed previously and returned.  Our room, despite being on the smaller-side, was completely adequate and spotlessly clean. The beds were comfortable - although pushing together two single-beds to make a double is never ideal! We also had a lovely little balcony, over-looking the pool, which was nice.  The…

title: Very good all in all, would return
review: Lovely boutique hotel in great location 5 mins from beach or bus stop to Palma. Arrived too early for room but they had a luggage room to store case and a men’s or women’s toilet and changing room where we could freshen up till the room was ready later which was really handy. Everything is spotlessly clean. Fairly small pool area with not many beds which were all reserved very early so you would have to have moved fast however we prefer the beach. Room was quite small but nice size comfy beds and a balcony which overlooked the pool. Only a couple of comments: there is no mirror in the bedroom at all so is a bit awkward if someone is already using the bathroom, not much storage but ok for the 5 nights we were there. Could have done with a shelf in the bathroom but I managed!…

title: Lovely Hotel
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The rooms are perfectly adequate in size, very clean and the beds are comfortable, to hire the safe for a week it cost us €19, there's a hair dryer in the bathroom, the air con worked well we had a decent sized balcony. The only thing lacking for me personally was tea/coffee making facilities in the room but it certainly didn't spoil the enjoyment of my holiday. All the staff work very hard and are extremely pleasant, polite and helpful. We loved the breakfast, the food is superb with plenty of choice and we couldn't fault it. The hotel is in an excellent location just a 5 minute walk to the beautiful beach. Also within walking distance to plenty of bars and restaurants. It was really quiet at night and we didn't hear any noise from…

title: Very nice break
review: I lovely hotel at a reasonable price.  The rooms are very small but the use of space is remarkable.  The whole place is kept to a very high standard of cleanliness. Staff are very helpfull and always cheerfull.  The breakfast was amazing definatley somthing for everybody. The pool area is not very big and only 32 sun loungers is definatley a problem but the hot tub is a nice little touch.  The bar drinks and food were reasonably priced and the menu was good. 10 minutes from the airport and a short walk to the beach perfect for a shirt break.

title: Nice Clean Hotel but small and lacks character
review: Stayed here for 8 nights in June on a B & B basis. Got a very good deal through Alpha Rooms so I did not have expectations that the hotel would blow me away. The hotel is small and split into two blocks opposite one another on a side street about 5 minute walk to the beach, so location is pretty good. There are no views to speak of and the surrounding area is residential. Expect a lot of noise from planes taking off from the airport. The pool is extremely small with a small hot tub. The sunbed area is also small and merges into the outside dining area which has a bar inside next to reception. The hotel is very modern and clean and the staff are very friendly and efficient. Cleaners where also very good. The rooms are pretty small with very limited wardrobe space and the walls a…

title: Delightful
review: Dear Mark,  Firstly we thank you for reaching out to us on Tripadvisor to share your concerns related to your recent holiday with us at BQ Amfora Beach and apologize that you felt your experience did not completely meet your expectations. Your feedback is really important to us and we will be making sure your remarks are bought to the attention of the appropriate management so they can share your comments about the areas you highlight in your review.  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: great place
review: nice hotel very friendly and clean. only a stroll to the beach where you will find lots of bar and restaurant. good place to stay and a great breakfast.bar area and terrace good with table services large screen tv.by reception aerea.

title: Great 8 night stay!
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for your nice opinion!  BQ Amfora Beach Hotel team thank you for your time writing this review and for your words about us! This is a strong motivation for us. We will be delighted if you would visit us again.  Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your Mallorca stay!  Best regards from BQ Hoteles

title: Excellent
review: This hotel is modern and we had a nice balcony with garden-view. It was located in a quiet residential area but within walking distance to the centre/the beaches. When we arrived at the hotel the reception staff gave us a room in the first floor. From the terrace we could only look into some tall trees. We asked for a room in the upper floors when we booked, and we telled this to the man in the reception. He asked us to contact the woman in the reception the day after. We explained all this again to her,and luckily she checked the system again and found a room in the third floor for us which we was pleased with.The breakfast was good!

title: Amazing 10 night stay!
review: Dear customer,  Thank you very much for your opinion, all the hotel team strive to make our customers feel at home with a high level of quality and service.  We will be happy to give you a warm welcome on your next visit.   Greetings  BQ Hoteles

title: Just a few tweaks would make it ideal but beware unexpected charges
review: Lovely hotel, very clean & airy. Nice rooms, maid service and clean towels daily. Epic breakfast, including a made to order pancake / omelette station. Extremely helpful staff, go there again? Oh yes, in a heartbeat.

title: Excellent stay
review: Booked direct with the hotel for a 3 night stay, the hotel had been recommended by a family member. Check-in was quick and staff very friendly, we requested a top floor room and upon arrival room was clean compact and had everything we could need for our stay. Breakfast was excellent, wide variety of anything you could want, including sparkling wine. Exceptionally clean restaurant and tables cleared and cleaned almost immediately that they are vacated. The hotel bar is very reasonable priced with food and drink excellent quality. Just a short walk from the hotel is a variety of shops and bars. Upon check out there is a free shower room available for use and bags can be left securely. Overall a first-class hotel thoroughly recommended

title: Great service , great hotel
review: Dear friend,  Thank you for your nice opinion!  BQ Amfora Beach Hotel team thank you for your time writing this review and for your words about us! This is a strong motivation for us. We will be delighted if you would visit us again.  Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your Mallorca stay!  Best regards from BQ Hoteles

title: Relaxing mini break
review: Staff couldn’t do enough for you & the food was very good & well priced Rooms were cleaned daily & as other reviews said small but adequate - could have done with a mirror in the bedroom over the dressing table Breakfast was brilliant - chef cooking eggs etc  Very near beach - 3min walk  Pool nice, not massive. Towels provided & lifeguard  Sun hit the sunbeds late morning, early afternoon  Beach costs approx 16€ for 2 beds & a brolly  Cab cost min €15 from airport even though journey short

title: Best hotel I have ever stayed in
review: Dear Claire,  Thank you very much for your opinion, all the hotel team strive to make our customers feel at home with a high level of quality and service.  We will be happy to give you a warm welcome on your next visit.   Greetings  BQ Hoteles

title: Clean and friendly
review: I shared a room with my sister. Side view with a little balcony. Would repeat what all the others said. Really clean modern hotel. We got a taxi 15 euros from airport. Dropped off at wrong BQ hotel taxi driver assured it was right. So we ended up with a short walk. Annoying when we paid 15 euros for a 5 min drive. Got bus back so straight forward.  Hotel 5 mins from beach where we spent every day. 5 .35 a day per bed. Much prefer beach as I didn’t really like the layout of the pool. It didn’t get sun until around noon and felt too oppressive liked the vibe at the beach better. Great snacks all well priced. Fab breakfast. Plenty to choose from. Small bedrooms but for 5 nights perfect. Wish there had been a bit of entertainment in the evening the whole resort was quiet so we just…

title: Small room with thin walls
review: We stayed at the hotel for 6 nights and were given a room on the first floor. There was a small bathroom with shower cubicle (just about big enough) and a comfortable double bed with enough room to walk down each side and along the bottom but no more room than that. In addition to this there was a small fridge, and a unit containing 2 or 3 shelves, 2 small drawers and a hanging rail about two feet wide (no doors on any part of the unit apart from the drawers). Had we been staying for 2 weeks I have no idea where we would have put our clothes. The room was advertised as being soundproofed but it was anything but. We could clearly hear the room next door’s TV - and they didn’t have it on loud - as well as hearing whenever they used the shower or flushed the toilet. That, allied to…

title: spring weekend
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us! We take great care to make our guests' stay as pleasant as possible; however, we note your comments and hope to provide a better experience on your next stay.   Best regards .  BQ Amfora Beach Hotel.

title: Great stay, very clean Hotel
review: great location close to airport, city of Palma and the beach, clean room, lovely breakfast we especially enjoyed the pancakes and the fruit, good coffee , nice poolarea (to cold because of season). nice beach, nice staff. close to bus-stop in to Palma city,

title: Nice & clean
review: Dear Cecilia,   Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience staying with us at the BQ Alcudia Sun Village Hotel and that you recognize our efforts for our valued guests!  Looking forward to welcome you again very soon! With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: The friendliest staff in Majorca
review: We've stayed here for an entire week and we can only recommend this place. It's very clean, the room we had had a small balcony, the staff was very friendly and attentive. Breakfast buffet was very good. Although Can Pastilla is not really top notch, the location was for us still very good, as Palma is not really far away and you can easily access the entire island.  This hotel is simple, but really recommendable.

title: Good Choice in C'an Pastilla
review: Had a five night stay in early April and BQ Amfora was a good choice.Well located in a quiet residential area.Room was small (104)and rooms 001-004 have a terrace that looks  on to the sunlounger area  not the most private of terraces.Very good and varied breakfast choices.Unless you are a really early bedder aircraft noise not a concern at night.  Bus stop for Palma just take a right outside the hotel followed by a left turn at the bottom of the road then approx. 100 yards on opp side of road is bus stop.  Palma is a nice city with a lovely old town, nice shops and of course the Cathedral and nearby Arab Baths are worth a visit.   C'an  Pastilla Crystal Church and attached museum was interesting .Cuban restaurant near front in C'an Pastilla was great value and big portions.

title: Lovely hotel.
review: Dear customer,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We wish to welcome you back very soon and return to enjoy a memorable experience with us, we will strive to please and surprise you on your next visit.  Greetings from Mallorca!  BQ Hoteles.

title: Super hotel to stay on your holiday to Can Pastilla!
review: This hotel was a perfect base for us. We were visiting family in Majorca but wanted to maintain a degree of independence. The rooms are small, but very clean and very modern. The breakfast was varied and well presented. The staff were all very friendly and very helpful. The bus service was within easy walking distance, ideal for visiting Palma. The local restaurants were a short walk away. Definitely stay again.

title: Perfect stay!
review: Dear friends,  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience. We are really delighted with your feedback about our staff and our service, and we are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at BQ Amfora Beach hotel.  We hope to be able to welcome you again very soon.  Best regards from BQ Hoteles.

title: Good hotel
review: Lovely modern hotel. Spotless. Staff warm and friendly and go out of their way to help any way they can. Breakfast bar amazing! Choices galore! Downside the horrid coffee machine in the breakfast room...worst coffee ever!!!! But.... upstairs proper barista coffee available from the bar. Nice meals/snacks. Good prices on food and drinks. We had a room with balcony over looking the street which I enjoyed immensely as I could see different architecture and flora/fauna. What else is there to say....will go there to stay each time we go to Can Pastilla!

title: Clean & Modern
review: Stayed for 4 nights for my birthday. The whole hotel is clean, fresh and modern and this applies to the rooms too. Although not that large, there's enough room for a few days or maybe a week's stay.  Good selection of English TV channels, mini fridge, powerful shower (with a frosted glass window into the bedroom).  Very comfortable beds and pillows.  Breakfast was decent, plenty to choose from. One improvement I would make would be warm plates near the hot buffet. The food cools down so quickly when using cold plates.  Bar and snacks very good and good prices.  Location good, 2 minutes to the beach, and supermarkets, bars, shops all around.  Would definitely use again.

title: Great modern hotel ...R215
review: Dear Philipp,  Thanks for your contribution. We are very glad that you enjoyed the breakfast at the hotel, therefore we would like to welcome you on your next visit to the Island, until then…   Best regards from all the BQ Amfora Beach team.

title: lovely short break
review: Stayed here in late April for 5 days B&B ...had a great time. It's a very modern hotel, nice clean white walls, very smart interior, bathroom was spotless and the shower was powerful and hot. Nice toiletries supplied. Bed was very comfy. TV channels separated into language, brits are well catered for here bbc1/2 itv1/2 an some foreign channels you can change language setting to dub back into English. I was in main hotel and rooms facing road got the sun at 3pm onwards, i was on the balcony from 3 till 7 enjoying the sun, pool was below room and was cold at this time of year but the sun loungers were very comfy. You could get bar service from the sun loungers which was a nice touch.  Breakfast plentiful and delicious. Show cooking was available, again nice touch.  Will stay here…

title: Amazing Stay
review: Dear Simon,  Many thanks from all the BQ Hoteles team for writing a review, we appreciate your assessment and we are pleased to know that we got you to enjoy a great experience with us, daily goal of all professionals who make BQ group.  We wish to welcome you back very soon and enjoy again a memorable experience with us, we will strive to please and surprise you on your next visit.  Greetings from Mallorca!

title: Holiday
review: Got the 21 bus from the airport , took 15 mins, drops off at end of the road ( stop at Hotel Linda) 5 euros each. Hotel is clean and bright. All staff are friendly and helpful.Room was small but everything you need including a small fridge ( no tea making facilities in the room ). Well equipped bathroom with brilliant shower. Breakfast was excellent with everything you need to set you up for the day. Food and drink prices in the hotel are very reasonable. Hotel is 200 yards from the sea front and beach.Will be back.

title: Blown away!
review: Clean, tidy and well presented rooms. Shower is powerful and hot. Breakfast spread is guaranteed to set you up for the day. Bar is VERY cheap. Staff are lovely. Finally, the staff must’ve noticed on my booking info that it was my birthday and I came back after a long day out walking to a chilled bottle of fizz! Amazing! Thanks.

title: Not bad ...
review: Dear Tony,  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience. We are really delighted with your feedback about our staff and our service, and we are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at BQ Amfora Beach hotel.  We hope to be able to welcome you again very soon.  Best regards from BQ Hoteles.

title: Fabulous Adult Only Hotel
review: Stayed 4 nights over the Easter weekend . Arrived early and room wasn't ready so we dropped luggage off in the room provided ... ask at reception for the key .. and we went for a drink down by the harbour .  Returned an hour or so later and room was ready . We were in the main hotel building there is an annexe building over the road . Our room was round the back of the hotel and to be honest the view from the balcony left a  to be desired  . I know this is nothing to do with the hotel but the building we over looked had a garden so over grown it looked like scrub land . Also a lot of the locals keep dogs shut up in apartments / flats all day , once one starts barking it sets the others off . This could get on  your nerves .  Back to the room .... We knew they were on the small…

title: BRILLIANT HOTEL AND EXCELLENT VALUE
review: Dear Jill,   It has been most pleasing to read that you had such a great time in our hospitality at BQ Amfora Beach and we want to thank you for sharing it with others. The fact that we were able to provide you with such a wonderful holiday experience is extremely satisfying and we will continue working hard to achieve this every day. We try to think of everything to provide our guests with a perfect holiday. Once more, we thank you for sharing this perfect review of our hotel and we hope that we will be able to serve you again in the future.   Best regards  BQ Hoteles.

title: Brilliant stay
review: My husband & I stayed here for a long weekend over the Easter weekend on a B&B basis and we could not have asked for a lovelier hotel.  From checking in with Michelle on reception, through to checking out in the early hours with a different member of staff, we could not have asked for a more friendly bunch.  The staff make this hotel, they always have a smile and like to have a little chat.  The cocktails are fabulous too and cheaper than outside of the hotel which is extremely unusual!  We also ate here a couple of times for lunch and dinner and again, the food was fabulous and half the price of outside of the hotel!  The hotel is so clean and tidy.  The rooms are smaller than we're used to, but have everything you need, including a mini fridge.  The hotel is also well located,…

title: Would definitely recommend!
review: We stayed here for five nights over the Easter break. Amazing value. Rooms are comfortable and spotlessly clean with bright and fresh decor. We had breakfast each morning and what superb choice! Eggs, omelettes and pancakes could be freshly cooked to order. Excellent friendly service from all staff. Pool area looked great although the weather wasn’t quite warm enough to try it out. Hotel is located in a side street and therefore there isn’t a sea view but the seafront is only a 200m walk away.

title: Brilliant hotel great service
review: Dear Sarah,   Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel and that you recognize our efforts for our valued guests!  Looking forward to welcome you again very soon! With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Fantastic place to stay
review: We checked into this hotel prior to 2pm. We knew the room would not be ready but just wanted to drop the bags off. The young lady on reception went out of her way to get us in a room that was ready. She was professional..friendly and very helpful giving us all the information regarding breakfast times..wifi codes etc. She is a real asset to the hotel. We parked just outside on the street. I would imagine high season you may struggle for parking. We walked into Palma on the coast road...a long walk but flat and very beautiful. The breakfast was good. Great coffee and the best orange juice we had on the Island. The rooms are small but clean and the showers are amazing. English channels on the TV. Close to the Airport so if you have an early flight definitely stay here.

title: great location.unbelievable breakfast
review: Dear Keely,  Many thanks from all the BQ Hoteles team for writing a review, we appreciate your assessment and we are pleased to know that we got you to enjoy a great experience with us, daily goal of all professionals who make BQ group.  We wish to welcome you back very soon and enjoy again a memorable experience with us, we will strive to please and surprise you on your next visit.  Greetings from Mallorca!

title: Excellent hotel, great location
review: Stayed here for three nights, had a wonderful time.   Location is pretty good, only a two minute walk from the sea and a plethora of markets and restaurants. The room was a bit small, but very clean and comfortable. Staff was very friendly and helpful as well.  Pool seemed fine but didn't get enough sunlight, and the jacuzzi was a lot colder than expected, so we didn't get to try either.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Have loved my stay at this hotel. Stayed 5 nights end of October. Breakfast has been lovely with a great selection.  Rooms very clean and modern, even have plugs at the side of the bed!!  Recommendation- offer half board for the perfect package.

title: The best Hotel ever in my life
review: Dear Rebecca,  Many thanks from all the BQ Hoteles team for writing a review, we appreciate your assessment and we are pleased to know that we got you to enjoy a great experience with us, daily goal of all professionals who make BQ group. We wish to welcome you back very soon and enjoy again a memorable experience with us, we will strive to please and surprise you on your next visit.  Greetings from Mallorca!

title: Excellent holiday
review: We stayed 7 days in BQ Amfora . Very nice staff, very clean rooms,  quited area, good comunication in english , big selection foor for breakfast, everything fresh and nice.Very Good price for drinks, beer  , cofee etc.  Nice selection TV channel and free good WiFi , ...high recommended

title: Lovely short break
review: Dear Damien It has been most pleasing to read that you had such a great time in our hospitality at BQ Amfora Beach and we want to thank you for sharing it with others. The fact that we were able to provide you with such a wonderful holiday experience is extremely satisfying and we will continue working hard to achieve this every day. We try to think of everything to provide our guests with a perfect holiday. Once more, we thank you for sharing this perfect review of our hotel and we hope that we will be able to serve you again in the future.   Best regards  BQ Hoteles.

title: Lovely Hotel, Great Breakfast!
review: Me and my friend stayed here for 3 nights, we had a great time, this hotel is spotlessly clean in all areas, rooms are good and beds comfortable, breakfast was amazing with an excellent selection of cold and hot food, snack menu is also good and very reasonable also, staff are all friendly and helpful, hotel is also close to the airport and shops and restaurants all nearby, so overall we would have no hesitation is recommending the Amfora beach to anyone visiting this lovely part of Majorca would definitely return, Thanks for a great time 😀.

title: Absolutely brilliant hotel and service!!
review: We stayed here in early October and everything from start to finish was fantastic!! Reception staff were all courteous and helpful, waiting on staff were very friendly and kept everywhere clear and clean. Rooms are tiny bit small but perfect for 3-5 day stay. The location was 5 minutes from beach and 5-10 minutes within lots of bars and shops and restaurants and the beaches are immaculate and again 5mins away.,we’ve booked again for May!!!

title: Lovely clean and bright hotel
review: Dear Darren, Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel and that you recognize our efforts for our valued guests! Looking forward to welcome you again very soon! With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Comfortable hotel
review: This Hotel is adults only and as such is great for unaccompanied adults.The rooms are clean and bright with all you could need. The breakfasts are superb and there is such variety of fresh fruits and freshly cooked omelettes,eggs and pancakes. The hotel is just a quick stroll to the beach and all the restaurants

title: Perfect for Airport Proximity
review: Dear Sally, Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We wish to welcome you back very soon and return to enjoy a memorable experience with us, we will strive to please and surprise you on your next visit. Greetings from Mallorca!  BQ Hoteles.

title: Beautiful structure, clean, with very friendly staff, in a great location!
review: Clean hotel in good position nearer to the beach than we thought which was a good thing. The most comfortable beds but the smallest room I have ever stayed in. Breakfast was excellent with lots of choice and the wifi was free and fast. Staff were friendly. Pool area although clean rarely got the sun which was a disappointment. Overall nice hotel to stay in.

title: Wonderful break
review: Spotlessly Clean Great location Excellent breakfast Nice pool Staff friendly Great WiFi Bike shed available Luggage room.and shower available Toiletries provided Nice bar and reasonable priced food and drink Comfortable bed Powerful shower Nice balcony Rooms on smaller side but no issue for us as few day trip Safe did not work

title: Great little modern hotel. Everything you need for a quiet holiday
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: relaxing hotel
review: Stayed here in April. Gem of a hotel. Spotlessly clean, quiet and great facilities and staff. Only a few minutes walk from the harbour with lots of bars and restaurants. We stayed half board and I actually enjoyed the 2 minute walk to the sister hotel for dinner. It felt like you were eating out every night.   Definitely worth hiring bikes and checking out the coastal cycle paths. Some beautiful views.   So good we're booked to go back in October. Can't wait!

title: Great hotel but very small rooms
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach! Looking forward to welcome you back again very soon! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: Lovely clean hotel amazing breakfast
review: Was a lovely hotel, the staff was helpful and friendly. The room i had was the opposite side of thye road from the main hotel, It was a nice room, it was comfortable. The location was farther from the beach than i thought it would be. I booked H/B & DISSAPOINTED that i had to go to a sister hotel the BQ APOLO for my evening meal. The food was good, but wasnt really happy with that. Entertainment was good, overall had a good time.

title: Great hotel
review: We've just spent a week at this lovely hotel. The staff were always very friendly and polite, the breakfast buffet was a veritable feast and it would be impossible not to find something if not all to eat and enjoy. The hotel is spotless and perfectly placed for the beach, bars and shops. Great experience for a first visit to Majorca. We will be booking again for next year.

title: Great location and spotless clean
review: Dear Carole, Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: Lovely clean hotel
review: Just returned from  a 14 night stay. Really pleased, modern and the cleanest hotel we have stayed at. All the staff were friendly and helpful and the cleaning team were constantly cleaning everything, rooms, bathrooms, glass , balconys, toilets etc The location is 5 mins from an excellent beach with plenty of restuarants and I can say in all the ones we tried the food was really good. Probably a quieter resort but taxis and buses are available to Palma approx 10 mins away if required. The pool and terrace area is not massive but we had no trouble getting a sunbed and a dip in the pool when we wanted and it was nice not to have giant inflatables and kids screaming around when we wanted to cool down. The choice for breakfast was outstanding with panckes, Omelettes cooked to order…

title: Modern and clean Hotel close to Beach.
review: Dear guest, Thank you for this nice review! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: Clean and central
review: Chose this hotel based on proximity to the beach. The location is great. The beach is 200m away & there are plenty of inexpensive restaurant & bars nearby. The bus stop is around the corner for easy access to Palma de Mallorca. The pool and hot tub are clean & there is a lifeguard on duty for most of the day. They have evening entertainment most nights and the breakfast had a great range of hot and cold foods including an omelette/pancake station. The room had a balcony and was clean. The food was good too & cocktails were very reasonably priced.

title: Spotless gem of a hotel
review: Have just returned from 5 nights at this lovely hotel.  The location is superb turn left from hotel and it's a short stroll to beach turn right and a short stroll to buses into Palma and airport.  Small spotless pool with plenty of sunbeds.  Reception staff very friendly and informative. Rooms are small but adequate and again good shower and meticulously clean.  In fact cleaners appear to be cleaning every area of hotel all day and evening.  Breakfast is buffet style with fabulous choice and choice of cooked eggs freshly done.  Reception told us about entertainment and this is advertised with start and finish time though noise never bothered us.  Thoroughly recommended as is that area of Can Pastilla with lovely beach and plenty of restaurants.  Beach is very safe in a sheltered…

title: Delightful short break
review: Dear guest, Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be also very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in one of our BQ Hoteles! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: Relaxing break
review: Stayed on the 1st July for three nights.  Ideally placed for Palma. The hotel is situated five minutes walk from a small sandy beach, with shops bars and restaurants in close proximity.  The hotel itself was spotlessly clean inside and out  with a small pool and sun loungers.   It was our anniversary holiday and the Hotel thoughtfully surprised us with a bottle of Cava to celebrate.   The room was very comfortable if a little small with TV, small desk, comfortable beds  and a small balcony overlooking the pool.   The bathroom had a large walk in shower.   Breakfast was excellent with hot and cold buffet  with something for every taste.   Bar prices surprisingly good for a hotel with friendly staff.   Staff on reception very helpful.  The only minus point was aircraft noise due…

title: Very good experience.
review: Dear guest, Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: Perfect few days close to Palma
review: We found the staff very helpful and always friendly . The rooms are compact but very clean and comfortable. It was lovely and peaceful on the evenings and just a few minutes walk to the beach. There are a lot of restaurants on the beach front , but if you go in a few streets will find little gems. We would definitely recommend this hotel and will be staying there again in the future.

title: Mini Break
review: Just returned from a 3 night stay. My husband and I stayed there last year and enjoyed our time so decided to go back. Location is great from the airport, close to beach and restaurants. Would certainly recommend and will be going back next year.

title: Birthday weekend away
review: Liebe Jane, Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: Pleasant stay for one week
review: Stayed at the hotel 22/6/17 to 25/6/17 for a long weekend.  Negatives first any transfer bus drops you a couple of minute walk away from the hotel. Service out by the pool was really slow and lifeguards looked totally uninterested being there.  The rest is very good. Reasonably priced drinks and food at the hotel. Never ate there but what i saw looked good. The room is small but very nicely done, and we didn't spend much time in the room anyway. Shower was very powerful so good for waking you up and toiletries good. Lady on reception with glasses was very nice, spoke good english so made checking in easy. The pool and pool area nice and clean, and generally a couple of sun beds available. The hotel is also spotlessly clean, the cleaning staff do a great job. Wifi in room and…

title: Lovely stay
review: Ddear guest, Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future! With warm regards, BQ Hoteles.

title: A great experience
review: Nice hotel in Can Pastilla, Mallorca.  + just 5 minutes by walk from the beach Cala Estanica or Can Pastilla + 10 minutes by taxi = 15 euro + 5 minutes from the bus stop. Buses bring you in Palma or S'Arenal + 5 minutes from various rental car companies + 5 minutes from the nearest supermarket + personal is very friendly and helpful. Speak various languages + breakfast is very reach and for every taste. Particularly pancakes that are made just in front of you. Delicious. + very cosy bar with good cocktails and big terrace. The snacks are also very good.  + the atmosphere at the pool is very relaxing and quiet.  + wifi is excellent + hotel is renovated  - no sound isolation. When our neighbors had a shower/wc we had a doubt whether it was in our bathroom or not. - the room and…

title: My stay
review: Just back from 12 night stay in anfora beach first class as normal,some changes all for the better,better waitress service better selection of meals and snacks by pool,bar prices cheaper than local bars a very relaxing and pleasant stay,more selection at breakfast only down side as I do not like eggs in first week only beans 1 morning when complained to Chorley at reception sorted many thanks all see you next may

title: Good place for sea rest...
