review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back againnext May!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Modern, clean hotel in a quiet area
review: Have stayed there in 2014 august , very comfortable and clean room, not big but clean.Personal was ok, The reception was not good at english. Hotel close to the aeroport and sea,beach. Also the bus station is near and u can get very easy to the city center, even by bike it takes 30 mins.

title: Another great stay
review: Dear Gana,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back againas we have completely remodeled the hotel!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Nice clean hotel
review: Don't want to repeat what others have already said recently (very good information from Joanne)...  5 Euro by bus, but if you prefer the luxury of a taxi, it is about 15-20 Euros. Very close to the beach. If you are hiring a car from many hiring places around the hotel, beware, it is a nightmare finding a parking after your long day trip! We drove around nearly 10 streets for 20 mins before finding a spot a mile away! Hotel Management, please note: there are no hooks for hanging cloths! No where to keep own toiletries!

title: Nice hotel
review: This hotel was for adults only . It was very well situated in a quiet street about 250yds from the beach and restaurants along the front.  When I stayed the restaurant was closed but there was food available in the snack back which had the addition of live music ... not raving ... just nice quiet music in keeping with the clientele.  Breakfast was very good with very helpful staff. Would stay there again.

title: Very nice
review: Dear Mick,  Thank you for your nice opinion. We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel.  Looking forward to welcome you back again very soon!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Wonderful hotel
review: The breakfast was really good. Something for everyone. There was also cava. The nearest beach was only 5min walk. Room was clean and comfy. Wifi was good and staff was nice. Bus to the palma de mallorca took around 40min.

title: Not far from the madding crowds
review: Dear guest, Thank you for your nice opinion. We are happy to know that you spend a comfortable stay with us. We will be delighted if you visit us again.  Best regards BQ Hoteles

title: Mostly positive
review: A very clean and modern hotel which runs as adult only - perfect! The rooms are quite small but it was all we needed as a place to sleep and wake up to the most amazing buffet breakfast where there is a show chef waiting to cook you delicious pancakes, fried eggs and omelettes. The rest of the breakfast selection was good too, with a wide range of options. Considering it is included in the price of the stay I was really impressed. There is dining options on site and although we didn't eat here the food we saw looked good and it was at a reasonable price, as well as the on site bar. It's a pretty central location, within walking distance of restaurants and bars as well as the aquarium and only a short walk up the road to get a bus into Palma. My only critique was that we were…

title: Super find
review: Just returned from a mini break at this hotel.  Excellent staff and cosy modern rooms. Lovely breakfast and reasonable bar prices.   What it lacks in missing a sea view makes up in the above...👍  Will definitely return.

title: Amazing in every way
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Great Hotel - Beware of GOLDCAR
review: Great beds, great breakfast, nice pool and jacuzzi. Staff are very friendly and happy to help.   The location is ideal and is a few minutes walk to beach and one minute to the bus stop to Palma, however still manages to be a quiet street.  Couldn't fault this hotel and will happily return!

title: Great Hotel in a Super Resort
review: Dear Connor,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion in Tripadvisor.  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Pro's Modern Hotel Good location Clean & Tidy Great Breakfast Value for money  Cons No sun till afternoon Parking    Really enjoyed my stay here. would certainly return without hesitation.  Beware of Goldcar  The charge you for insurance that you do not need...without offering the option to you. They hand you your contract at the same time as a map showing you where your car is parked. Don't sign the "black" screen that they ask you to.  Top Tip...Use a local insurance provider at home to cover you comprehensively for car hire. Should be about a quarter of what Goldcar charge.

title: very nice
review: in a quiet spot but 2 mins to beach & restuarants.very modern clean hotel with lovely staff.Comfy beds & great shower..breakfast very good choice.shower & towels available on leaving day if you have a late flight only negative..rooms small & no sun at the pool which is a shame as it`s lovely with a hot tub as well 5pm the sun comes around but not for long.

title: Nice adult only hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind all of your feedback and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Did not disappoint.  Excellent hotel.
review: Set in a quite side road which leads to the smaller beach and a few minutes to the much larger beach. The hotel is very clean and modern with a small pool and sun terrace area. This pool area is only really used in the afternoon as the sun does not reach it till after lunch. The rooms are small and it is impossible for two people to pass in the space at the end of the bed, you need to move to the side to let another person pass. The wardrobe area is limited too, not enough hanging/drawer space for two people unless you travel light.The bathroom is small but well designed and a good range of toiletries are supplied and replenished when used. My dislike was the glass wall to the bathroom and the sliding door, which because it met with the glass wall, stopped short of meeting…

title: BQ AMFORA Nice Stay
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind all of your feedback and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience with larger size rooms.  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Really really nice hotel
review: This was our second stay in the hotel.  We were on the top floor of the hotel this time and the views were much better than on a lower floor.  We also stayed in the main part of the hotel rather than the annex across the road which meant the balconies were significantly larger.  The rooms also appeared to be a little larger.  The rooms were well appointed and maintained to a high standard.  There is a 32 inch television which gets among other channels BBC1 and 2, ITV 1, 2 and 4.  The rooms are quiet and there is an excellent range of toiletries in the well appointed bathroom.  The only thing the rooms do not have is a kettle and tea/coffee making facilities but these we had brought with us.  The hotel has a large breakfast room but apart from that the only food sold are snacks…

title: A wonderful stay
review: Very modern, very clean hotel with friendly staff. Situated in a quiet residential street close to all amenities and bus stops. Amazing choice at breakfast, something for everybody. The room was wholly adequate and had everything one could need. The only slightly negative comment I have concerns the lack of a shelf in the bathroom. All my bathroom items had to be placed on top of the toilet cistern. Free wifi works throughout the hotel and is strong and consistant. I would highly recommend this hotel to anybody. I shall certainly stay at this hotel again for my next visit to Mallorca.

title: Comfortable stay for a couple of days
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: very comfortable hotel
review: Just back from a short stay in C'an Pastilla. Chose this hotel as it was in the vicinity of another id stayed at, cheaper per night, and looked more modern in the photos.   Upon arrival, received a polite and professional greeting from the young lady at reception. Everything I needed to know explained in detail.  Room was a double despite being a solo traveller, but think it might be a struggle for more than one person to feel comfortable in the rooms of this size. Was just about right for me.  Good portion of complimentary toiletries in the bathroom, including shaving kit, manicure kit, toothpaste and travel-like brush, shower gel and shampoo. Even a sewing kit was included.  Nice modern LED TV mounted on to the wall with a variety of channels in many languages.  Bed very…

title: "pleasantly surprised"
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind all of your feedback and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Great  Hotel, Immaculately clean, loved it
review: Hotel is very clean and the staff at the reception desk is very friendly. The breakfast is also great, lots of choice and the waitresses are always welcoming. Once you've checked out you can even take a shower downstairs and the reception desk will provide you with clean towels. Only downside was the WIFI. We stayed on the 3rd floor and had bad reception. For the rest, a hotel that has thought about everything!

title: Clean and Comfortable
review: Small rooms but bathroom good size - shower was great with plenty of free toiletries- bed comfortable. Planes going over constantly and pool area shaded until after 2. Breakfast good although coffee not great.

title: A gem hotel in the most unexpected place
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind the quality of the coffe and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Quiet and pleasant hotel with excellent location but very small rooms
review: Easy to find hotel with excellent amenities. As previous reviewers have mentioned rooms are compact but spotlessly clean and very modern. The fridge in the room is a bonus. Supply of toiletries was a lovely surprise who'd expect toothbrushes and toothpaste?  Breakfast selection was probably the best we have experienced. Staff extremely pleasant and willing to help. Bus no 21 from airport at 5 euro takes you to Can Pastilla within an easy 5/10 min journey. Hiring a bicycle is a must. This gem of a hotel is in the middle of a residential area which we thought was good as it was away from the hussle of a busy resort.  On several nights there was various entertainment in the reception area which was something unexpected but good.

title: good location, modern rooms, lovely staff & great breakfast
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind all of your feedback and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: great hotel
review: My husband and I were impressed with the quiet location on a residential side street, with easy access to beautiful but crowded Can Pastilla Beach (turn left from the hotel and walk two blocks for the posh end of the beach or turn right and right again past a few blocks of shops, cafes and bars to the larger centre of the beach). But the rooms are very small for two people. We did have a nice balcony (ask for a high floor). Other advantages--  Nice outdoor pool with very helpful lifeguard Excellent air conditioning Free wifi that actually works in the room Adults only (although I saw families with children clearly under 16, including on our floor, staying there) No noise from other rooms or guests Good breakfast buffet Easy access to Palma on bus 15 or 30 & to the airport on bus…

title: A hidden gem
review: The hotel is a 2 minute walk to the beach down the street, so impossible to get lost.  You'll most definitely need to go to the beach as the pool doesn't get any sunshine until much later in the afternoon and is very small.  I can't comment on the pool itself as I never went in. Bedrooms are very modern, clean and bright. A kettle would have been  nice but coffee served at the bar was excellent. Breakfast was extremely varied and of a very high quality, although I'm not sure who eats onion rings and broccoli for breakfast.  You also get a very extensive toiletry collection including toothpaste, toothbrush, shoe shine, shower hat along with all of the usual shampoo, shower gel and soap. The staff were all great, rooms were cleaned daily. All in all an excellent hotel. Personally…

title: Nice Middles class Place to stay
review: Not far from the Beach, 3 mins walk, 2 Buildings seperated by the street, recently re-opened after being re-built, all new and semi-design, nice deco but still a basic functioning holiday hotel with middle class standards, simple but clean and cosy, the food is good for the price the price is ok, what you pay for is what you get. no complaints, good economical stay.

title: Nice people
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Well earned break
review: Just returned after a 5 night stay. Nice clean hotel. Nice room. Nice breakfast. Very helpful staff.(nice people) All in all a great place for a short holiday. Would definitely return. Cannot believe that trip advisor puts a limit on how many words a review needs to be. Its a good hotel in a good location with nice , friendly helpful people in a goos location. Try dragging that out to two hundred words without over elaborating.

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Lovely place
review: We have just returned from a 3 night stay here. I travelled with my husband for his birthday.  The hotel is spotlessly clean and the staff are friendly. The breakfast is lovely, lots of variety. The rooms are very small but all you need really for a short stay. The hotel is in a lovely quiet location only a very short walk to the beautiful beach. The beach itself is lovely. Clean, shallow water.  Lots of shops and restaurants all at reasonable prices. Would definitely stay again.

title: Wouldn't go back
review: Dear Julie,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Good Location
review: Firstly the hotel is fine, details to follow, but the pool area is in full shade till mid afternoon - it was therefore really annoying to be told by the 12 year old lifeguard that no-one could move the sun loungers to the one corner of the pool area that did have a sliver of sun from late morning. No reason could be given, just that it was 'the rules' (hardly surprising then that the pool was empty, so no-one around buying drinks etc). The one saving grace was the lovely hot tub.  The hotel is clean and modern and apart from the above is perfectly fine for the price.

title: Welcoming staff, great location acceptable breakfast
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind all of your feedback and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Perfect base for the Beach
review: I booked this hotel as required a hotel near to the airport and beach as away for a mini break.   The hotel was lovely and clean with friendly helpful staff. Read many reviews prior to booking and agree the breakfast is wonderful.   Room I agree is a little tight but it was bright, modern and clean which is far more important.  A lovely touch was the toiletries in the bathroom. Great to see a hotel supplying such a selection just encase you forgot something.   Will certainly be going back.

title: Excellente
review: Currently staying here Great hotel,very clean and fresh,good sized rooms Breakfast fantastic-caters for everybody Pool quiet -plenty of sun loungers Short walk to beach and restaurants Palma only 15 mins away-bus stop nearby So far a great stay

title: Fab hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles

title: Bit ibis ish  but good location
review: Lovely stay at a fab hotel.  Short break, five days.  Lovely room on ground floor overlooking pool. Toiletries provided,great addition. Facilities were fab. Breakfast amazing, lots to choose from including Prosecco. Very clean, staff very friendly.

title: Very modern hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles

title: Nice, new hotel
review: Good  location, staff great, breakfast excellent. Very small  room (and shower!)(bring your kettle  if you want a brew in the morning!)  Beds comfyish but soft. Handy for bus  to palma and airport.  Feels a bit like an ibis standard but very clean and friendly. Pool area very small where beds are set out very close together and only gets sun later on the day. Plenty  of beaches to chose from ( would recommend  bigger one for breeze). Have occasional acts on at hotel but layout doesn't maximise on this as in the reception area. Limited sea view as off the front but other than that loved it!

title: Nice Hotel... Small rooms
review: Hey,  We just came back from a 5 night stay at the hotel. There are some good points abs not so great points so I will be as honest as I can be:  Good Points: -The place is modern and very clean - it is a good location - 2 mins away is the bus stop that takes you regularly to Palma centre or the airport -we really liked the area. Close to beach and restaurants and bars and easily assessable to Palma too. -good variety at breakfast  Not so great Points: -The rooms are very very small. This is ok though but we were shuffling past each other a lot - the pool doesn't get the sun great. It's on the wrong side of the hotel so we literally never went in the pool area. It was so much sunnier on the beach. -at breakfast it is very hectic with mainly Germans. Which is fine but felt like a…

title: Loved it!
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind all of your feedback and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Brilliant Hotel Fantastic Location
review: Stayed here for a long weekend and absolutely loved it! We arrived at 11.30am and didn't expect our room to be ready but it was. We were pleasantly surprised with the room which was on the 4th floor. The furnishings were lovely. The view was over the gardens of some private properties and you could see the sea. It had a fridge, safety deposit box and hair dryer. Storage was quite limited though and I think if you stayed for a week, you'd struggle a bit but for 3 nights, it was fine. The bathroom was great with a fab shower and there were loads and I mean loads of different toiletries provided. Breakfast was absolutely lovely with everything you could possibly want and the restaurant was beautifully decorated and light and airy. Beach towels are available to hire at 10 euros each…

title: Small but very clean rooms, good location.
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Spotless, friendly and relaxed spot
review: We arrived at hotel early 10am and was told by the receptionist that our room was nearly ready and would we like to help ourselves to breakfast. This made a nice change and the breakfast was superb . The room was clean, modern and sleek and maybe a tad small but you dont go on holiday to spend all day in your room. Overall a great hotel with a great breakfast which included Prosecco

title: Great stay!
review: I was there with my boyfriend for 10 days and really had a great stay. Breakfast is really diverse and there is always a lots of fruits, beagles, and something for everybody. Our favorite were pancakes, which we had every day of our stay. Overall it is pretty clean hotel, I would give it a 4.5 of 5 points for that. Rooms are little small for our taste, it would be better if they were bigger just for comfort but as I said, it still was a great stay. Don't expect a big pool, it's not for swimming I would say, but just to chill or cool down. Staff was helpful now and there, but sometimes it wasn't the best service you could get. Would recommend and would come again there. Oh and wi-fi is really great :)

title: Perfection!!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us! However, we will bear in mind all of your feedback and hope that next time we can offer you a better experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Great hotel!
review: Everything about this place exudes perfection, situated just across the beach it is simply stunning. The rooms are spotless and spacious with a/c, hairdryer and too many extras to list. The staff are ultra friendly and helpful, the roof terrace is 'asombroso' and the buffet breakfast......just WOW!!!!! Fruit, assorted fresh breads, cooked foods and prosecco, yes prosecco!!! To put it simply if you are coming to this area it would be a crime not to stay here!

title: Adult only hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion!  We are delighted to hear you thoroughly enjoy the time you spend at our hotel, we really do appreciate your kind words.  We hope to welcome you back again soon, hopefully we can provide you with an even better stay!   With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles

title: Great location
review: Nice hotel, clean room, helpfull and friendly staff, good location for beach and restaurants. Near several busstops and just a short ride from the airport. Breakfast is awesome!!!!!! Prices in bar and restaurant just somewhat higher then in normal businesses. If you need information ask Jimena, if you want to dance ask Juan.

title: Absolutely brilliant.
review: We stayed here for several nights. And everything was excellent.. Good breakfast, great location.. Short walk to either beach or bus stop,  very clean, friendly staff.. And very helpful.. We arrived on an early flight and returned on a late flight.. On check in and check out the staff were brilliant.  Will definitely stay again

title: Superb booked again for October
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We would be very proud to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Fully renovated. Fantastic breakfast.
review: BQ is located near the bus stop from the airport and is some 300 yards from the sea.  The hotel is now adult only.  The hotel is made up of two parts the main hotel and on the other side of the road the annex (about 20 rooms).  All the facilities are in the main hotel swimming pool, bar and restaurant.  Entry to the annex is through a door which is opened using your room key.    The rooms are not large but are clean, comfortable and contain all the facilities you would expect.  The rooms are well furnished and the bathroom contains a wide range of toiletries.  The rooms in the annex where we stayed were very quiet and there was little or no noise from the corridors or neighbouring rooms.  There was some noise that came through the balcony doors, this was made up mainly from…

title: Perfect for the price
review: Dear guest,  We are glad you had an enjoyable stay!  We will love to have you back!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Wonderful experience!
review: Completely renovated hotel. Small rooms but well designed and comfortable. Location in a quiet road, no noise from outside. Fantastic buffet breakfast. Nice and efficient reception staff, especially Mrs Mariela. Easy connection to airport with bus 21 (10 minutes, ticket 3 euros). Also easy bus connection to the center of Palma: 6 km, 1.50 euros. Bus stops near Hotel Linda, 3 minutes walk.

title: Wonderful place with friendly people
review: We stayed at this hotel for about 2 weeks in August 2015. Rooms are small, but clean. The balcony is also clean and big enough. We spent there some time in the afternoon, when it was too hot on the sea.  This hotel offers breakfast, which is good enough. Everyone can find something tasty: from fruits to pancakes. The staff is friendly and hospitable. The sea is 300 meters down the street. However, we found the beach that is 10 minutes away much better. It's long (7 km) and wide with a lot of cafés.  We enjoyed our stay and hope to get back again.

title: Really pleasant stay
review: Many thanks for your nice opinion!  We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We are also looking forward to welcome you back again very soon and to provide you a good experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: worthy for the price
review: This was just a short 2 nights stay. The hotel is some 7 minutes walking distance from the beach, in a quiet street. Recently renovated in a modern but not the cold anonymous design. Most of the guests were Germans (or German speaking) but that could also be depending on the season. The staff on the Reception is really very nice, including the kind night porter. Very professional, too. The rooms are rather small but they are comfortable. We were lucky to get a room on the highest floor. We enjoyed the breakfast as well - better than the usual Mallorquin standard with a good choice. If I would come back? Definitely! Any time!

title: Will defo be going again
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience with us and can't wait to have the pleasure to welcome you back again very soon!  With warm regads,  BQ Hoteles.

title: New, clean and narrow hotel
review: the hotel is new or renovated, and it's very nice and clean. it has a bar, a pool and the rooms have everything you need. they're not very big but are functional and clean. it's not too far from the beach but it's near to the airport and a bus station which is about 3 min walk. the service is good, the bookings are usually with breakfast included which is excellent. only liability is that it has no parking space, and i might add that there is no wi-fi (at least last year there wasn't) and only one computer for internet surfing and slow connection. other than that everything was good

title: Muchas gracias por todo!!
review: ,Amazing stuff, great location in Can Pastilla  clean and quiet hotel, with tasty breakfast.  Under the circumstances we had - you were my savers!  Choli, Limena, Alejandro yi todo.. :)   !!El mejor gentes en Mallorca

title: If only the soundproofing was better...
review: Dear Karin,  Many thanks for your great opinion!  We are very happy to know that you had a good time staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel and we are really looking forward to welcome you back very soon!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Holidays in August
review: We have just got back from our honeymoon. Stayed in this hotel for 6 nights. And I gotta be honest, even though the hotel is a 4 star, recently refurbished, clean, looked new, in a great location, but the soundproofing as BQ website states WAS NOT there. I could hear everything that was happening in the nearest rooms like flushing the water in the toilet, or someone taking a shower, and to make things worse, we had a neighbor who was coughing all night and every time he coughed, we woke up. In the next morning I went to the reception and asked if we could get another room, and we got it as there was one free. It was now in the 2nd floor and next to the stairs. We now could hear noises when someone was jumping the stair steps like a maniac, and there were many people doing that…

title: Summer vacation in Mallorca
review: Dear Aigars,  Thank you very much for your opinion! We are sad to hear that this time you were not 100% satisfiyed with your experience at the BQ Hoteles. We will bear your opinions in mind and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in a future to provide you the good experience you deserve.  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Relaxing Hotel
review: We were here this August. The hotel looks nice and clean. The double rooms are rather small but bright and looking nice. They are cleaned each day. WiFi and TV works perfectly.  The staff here is rather helpful and nice but there were few exceptions to this.  There is a good choice at breakfast which is good because some things are not really edible (scrambled eggs, sausages or coffee). There is some choice of food for lunch or dinner in the lobby bar but not very tasty. The swimming pool is nice and not busy at all.  All in all, the hotel is good for the price and I wold come back here or choose it again but I wouldn't rate it four stars.

title: Fantastic stay
review: Lovely place, very modern, super clean and very well located. Breakfast was great with much variety and attentive waitresses keeping the stock replenished and dining rooms clean. Nice little pool too although the majority of the sun loungers don't get the (summer) sun until the afternoon. Would definitely stay again

title: 4 star hotel?
review: Dear guest,  Many thanks for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We are also looking forward to welcome you back again very soon and to provide you a good experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles

title: Lovely hotel perfectly located for a short, relaxing holiday
review: I stayed there for 2 nights. Good thing was that it was a new building and very close to the beach. Rooms were with balcony, sound proof and had comfy beds. but it was very tiny. Staffs were ok, but some of them were not so friendly. The breakfast was not something I would expect for the 4 star hotel. It reminded me of food from a school dormitory.

title: Lovely modern hotel
review: Dear Hyewon,  Thank you very much for your nice opinion. We are happy to hear that you had a good time staying with us but we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again very soon in order to give you our best.  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Cute renovated clean hotel
review: Stayed there for a week in the end of may. The hotel was perfectly located, very clean and beautiful. Juan the bartender was amazing and provided the best service possible and also the pool guard he was super nice! The only downside was that the rooms were smaller than we expected and that there is no restaurant at the hotel. Would definitely stay there again if i would return for a short visit in mallorca.

title: Lovely Relaxing Place
review: I really liked this Hotel there was a relaxing atmosphere about the place. The Pool was nice and never to busy. The rooms were cleaned to a good standard and the bed (most importantly) was very comfortable and I will go back next year I liked it so much and can pastilla as a place. The Breakfast was very good lots of choice couldn't find any faults really..happy days

title: Super
review: Dear guest,  Many thanks for your nice opinion! We are very happy to hear that you had a good experience staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We are also looking forward to welcome you back again very soon and to provide you a good experience!  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: Great deal!
review: Great hotel, not exensive if you book on time! The breakfast is great, rooms are cleaned everyday. The staff is friendly, willing to help. I recomend it! Nice small rooms with terace, tv...comfy beds and no noise at night!

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Dear guest,  Many thanks for your great opinion!  We are very happy to know that you had a good time staying with us at the BQ Amfora Beach Hotel! We are looking forward to welcome you back very soon,  With warm regards,  BQ Hoteles.

title: A gem of a place
review: Hotel is newly renovated. Rooms are a bit small but clean and bright. Cleaning is very good. The staff is very nice and willing to help.The breakfast is really good. A lot of things to choose. Everything fresh. When we arrived I was worried because of the noices from the airport, but at night they stop it. Really recommended.
